settings.title: AI Service Settings
settings.subtitle: Choose the AI provider that powers your resume polishing features.

doubao.desc: By ByteDance, optimized for Chinese context.

openai.desc: The world's leading AI model, highly versatile.

deepseek.desc: DeepSeek open-source model, strong in coding and reasoning.

moonshot.desc: Kimi assistant, excellent at long context handling.

settings.noteDetail: Currently only Doubao is fully configured in the backend demo. Other providers are placeholders for demonstration purposes and will return mock data.

hero.subtitle: Create professional, polished resumes in minutes. Leverage AI-assisted writing and automatic formatting to elevate your career.

whyChoose.title: Why Choose Ximo Resume
whyChoose.subtitle: More than just an editor, it's your career assistant

features.title: Smart Features to Stand Out
features.description: Utilize state-of-the-art AI technology to optimize your resume content, check for grammar errors, and ensure every detail is perfect.

security.title: Data Security, Privacy First
security.description: All resume data is stored locally on your device, so you never have to worry about privacy leaks. Export and back up anytime to keep your data available.

local.title: Local File Storage
local.desc: Resume data is securely stored on your computer drive

items.a: Yes, all basic features of Ximo Resume are currently free to use.
Absolutely. Your resume data is stored locally in your browser. We do not upload your personal information unless you opt for cloud sync.
We support exporting to high-quality PDF and PNG image formats for easy printing and sharing.

cta.title: Ready to get started?
cta.desc: Join now and build your career future with Ximo Resume.

warning.title: Warning
warning.text: Your resume data is stored locally. Do not clear browser cache or data will be lost.

dashboard.createNewDesc: Start from scratch or use a template

actions.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this section?

templates.title: Choose Template
templates.subtitle: Select a layout for your resume

descriptions.modern: Clean and professional with standard layout for most roles
descriptions.classic: Traditional centered header with elegant typography
descriptions.leftRight: Two-column layout with a colored sidebar highlighting key info
descriptions.minimalist: Simple and elegant with plenty of white space
descriptions.professional: Bold headers and high contrast for senior roles

placeholder.selectSection: Please select a module from the sidebar or click on the preview area to start editing
